Activate 1 (manipulate)

Vyre's Bliss is a toxin that looks and tastes like fine wine.

Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:43]

Maximum Duration 24 hours

Stage 1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Off-Guard] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 1} (1 round)

Stage 2 off-guard, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 1}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 2} (1 round)

Stage 3 off-guard, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 2}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 3} (1 round)

Stage 4 clumsy 2, stupefied 3, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Unconscious] (8 hours)
